description:
Why work Events & Travel:

  • Freedom from the 9-5 Grind: Embrace a lifestyle where you dictate your schedule and priorities
  • Work from home or wherever you would like
  • Thriving Events & Travel Industry: Join a dynamic sector brimming with endless opportunities for growth

Your Role:

  • Collaborate with clients to curate unforgettable travel experiences for sports events, concerts, and more
  • Utilize your entrepreneurial flair to establish and manage your own business in the travel industry
  • Harness the support and resources of a host agency to streamline your journey to success
  • Stay informed about industry trends, sports calendars, and event schedules to provide top-notch service

Qualifications:

  • Passion for travel and helping others
  • Motivation and dedication
  • Excellent Communication Skills
  • Organizational Prowess
  • Tech Proficiency for Remote Work

What We Provide:

  • Comprehensive Training and Support
  • Access to Established Industry Networks
  • 1099 Business Benefits
  • Flexibility to Work from Anywhere
  • Mentorship
  • Travel Perks and Incentives

Submit an application to begin the next chapter of your life!
